Happy / Radiant: bilateral zygomaticus major contraction, upward mouth corner elevation, subtle cheek puffing, relaxed forehead, genuine duchenne smile
Sad / Despondent: depressor anguli oris activation, downturned mouth corners, slight inner brow elevation, drooping upper eyelids, heavy emotional weight
Angry / Incensed: contraction of corrugator supercilii, vertical glabellar lines, lowered medial eyebrows, tensed jaw muscles, focused aggressive gaze
Surprised / Aghast: maximal frontalis contraction, horizontal forehead furrows, wide palpebral fissures, dropped mandible, sudden inhalation posture
Scared / Terrified: maximal eyelid retraction, visible superior sclera, tensed platysma neck muscles, flared nostrils, frantic ocular tracking
Bored / Listless: partial ptosis of upper eyelids, relaxed facial musculature, neutral mouth position, vacant ocular focus, slumped facial posture
Disgusted / Repulsed: wrinkled levator labii superioris, elevated nasal wings, nasolabial fold deepening, squinted eyes, curled upper lip
Furious / Enraged: intense masseter clench, bared teeth with gingival exposure, narrowed eyes, tensed nasal bridge, visible vein on temple
Hyper-Dilated Pupil Response: maximal mydriasis, expanded pupillary diameter 8mm, autonomic nervous system arousal, dark ocular depth, zero light constriction
Alar Flare (Physical Strain): lateral expansion of the nasal wings, flared nostrils, deep inhalation posture, increased respiratory effort, sympathetic arousal
Primal Snarl: bilateral levator labii superioris alaeque nasi contraction, exposed canine teeth, wrinkled nasal bridge, aggressive ocular focus
Lip Compression (Determination): tightened orbicularis oris, flattened labial profile, zero mucosal visibility, firm horizontal mouth line, intense resolve
Gaze Fixation: zero saccadic movement, locked ocular axis, intense pupillary focus, unblinking palpebral state, predatory or analytical concentration
Subtle Micro-Tremor: minute muscular quivering in the mentalis or orbicularis oculi, high-tension state, nearly imperceptible vibration of the skin surface
Rapid Eye Movement (REM) State: eyelids closed but trembling, visible ocular globe motion beneath the dermis, relaxed facial mask, dreaming brain-wave aesthetic
Analytical Scrutiny: unilateral eyebrow depression, narrowed palpebral fissure, tilted cranium, subtle mouth corner compression, deep cognitive processing
Sardonic Half-Smile: unilateral buccinator activation, asymmetrical mouth corner lift, mocking ocular gaze, subtle crow's feet on one side only
Enigmatic / Mona Lisa Look: minimal muscular engagement, ambiguous mouth corner tension, 'smiling with eyes' (smize), calm forehead, mysterious facial symmetry
Calculated Stoicism: clinical neutral mask, zero micro-expression leakage, fixed jaw alignment, detached ocular reflection, professional emotional void
Intellectual Hubris: elevated chin posture, downward ocular gaze (looking down the nose), unilateral brow lift, smug facial stillness
Feigned Interest: exaggerated eyebrow elevation, static frozen smile, vacant ocular focus, slightly tilted head, performing social politeness
Nostalgic Melancholy: softened ocular focus (looking into distance), subtle downturned mouth corners, relaxed brow, reflective and quiet facial state
Total Ego Dissolution: maximal ocular expansion, vacant stare into the void, slack facial musculature, disconnected consciousness, transcendent or broken state
Visceral Agony: maximal contraction of all facial muscles, deep glabellar furrows, wide open mouth in silent scream, tensed neck platysma cords
Manic Euphoria: wide-eyed frantic joy, asymmetrical facial tension, hyper-active ocular movement, unnerving wide grin, sweat-sheen on skin
Catatonic Stare: complete lack of ocular tracking, fixed statue-like mask, waxy skin texture aesthetic, zero response to external stimuli
Possessed / Ocular Inversion: retroverted ocular globes, maximal sclera exposure, unnatural jaw dislocation, rigid and twisted facial architecture
Predatory Hunger: lowered medial brows, focused pupillary constriction, salivating oral posture, forward-leaning head tilt, high-alert facial state
The Thousand-Yard Stare: focused on a point miles away, detached ocular depth, emotionally hollow mask, trauma-induced facial stillness
Deep Narcotic Sleep: complete muscle atonia, partial mouth opening, rhythmic slow breathing, zero ocular response, pale skin undertones, total facial relaxation
Hypothermic Shiver: rapid spasmodic contraction of facial muscles, blue-tinted labial mucosa, pale skin, shivering jaw, tightened brow, frosted eyelashes
Heat-Stroke Exhaustion: pronounced flushed malar region, sweat-beaded dermis, drooping eyelids, dry cracked lips, unfocused ocular gaze, labored oral breathing
High-G Force Strain: facial skin pulled back toward ears by gravity, sagging cheeks, intense jaw pressure, narrowed eyes, visible skin-stretching, distorted anatomy
Oxygen Deprivation (Cyanosis): blue-tinted lips and skin, flared nostrils, panic-stricken eyes, tensed neck platysma muscles, gasping oral posture, high-stress state
Feverish Delirium: glazed ocular surface, flushed cheeks, sweat-slicked forehead, slight asymmetrical mouth twitching, unfocused erratic gaze, sickly skin sheen
Complete Physical Burnout: pronounced sunken infraorbital hollows, slack mandibular hinge, dull ocular reflection, zero facial tension, gray skin tone aesthetic
Serrated Grin: maximal retraction of lips, exposure of elongated canine teeth or fangs, wrinkled nasal bridge, focused predatory eyes, aggressive muzzle-tension
Feral Hiss: tensed facial mask, narrowed eyes, arched tongue visible, bared gums, aggressive forward head tilt, displaying territorial dominance
Blood-Lust Trance: hyper-dilated pupils, blood-stained labial area, twitching nasal wings, intense tunnel-vision focus, animalistic facial urgency
Gleaming Alpha Stare: golden or colored ocular reflection, steady unblinking gaze, low-centered head position, subtle growling mouth posture, predatory stillness
Eldritch Distortion: unnatural facial stretching, multiple pupil-like ocular artifacts, shifting skin textures, void-like oral aperture, uncanny biological horror
Submerged Predator: eyes positioned just above water surface, ripples around orbital sockets, focused steady gaze, hidden lower facial features, aquatic stealth
Shadow-Stalker Focus: eyes glowing in deep shadow, obscured facial features, sharp rim-light on teeth or eyes, predatory silhouette, high-contrast dark aesthetic
Marble-Carved Stoicism: zero skin texture, smooth white stone-like surface, fixed unmoving gaze, perfectly symmetrical classical features, museum-grade statue aesthetic
Porcelain Doll Vacancy: hyper-smooth painted skin, oversized glass ocular globes, frozen fixed smile, slight joint-lines visible at neck, uncanny valley inanimate look
Divine Serenity (Zenith): completely closed eyes, faint upward mouth corner tilt, glowing skin aura, zero stress lines, transcendent facial peace, holy illumination
Ancient Deity Wrath: wide stone eyes, furrowed rock-textured brow, open mouth in eternal shout, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting on hard surfaces, mythological anger
Gilded Icon Mask: metallic gold skin surface, etched facial details, unblinking jewel-toned eyes, rigid ceremonial posture, ritualistic mask aesthetic
Weathered Bronze Decay: oxidized green skin patina, cracked facial surface, missing eye-filler, stoic aged expression, ancient metallic corrosion texture
Angelic Compassion: soft-focus features, tear-welled eyes, glowing highlights, slight head tilt, warm benevolent atmosphere, divine empathy
Ahegao / Sensory Overload: extreme facial ecstasy, crossed ocular axis, protruded tongue, rolled-back eyes showing sclera, flushed skin, maximal sensory peak
Bedroom Eyes (Heavy-Lidded): partial palpebral closure, relaxed brow, seductive gaze, dilated pupils, subtle smirk, intimate and inviting facial state
Silent Film Anguish: exaggerated facial sorrow, wide eyes, hand-to-forehead gesture, high-contrast emotional mask, dramatic theatrical lighting
Pin-up Surprise: perfectly round 'O' mouth shape, arched eyebrows, wide eyes, playful and exaggerated shock, vintage 1950s aesthetic
Femme Fatale Smirk: asymmetrical lip corner lift, narrowed bedroom eyes, tilted chin, mysterious and dangerous confidence, noir-lighting focus
Ecstatic Bliss: head tilted back, closed eyes with soft tension, parted lips, flushed cheeks, expression of pure sensory pleasure
Lip-Bite / Tease: lower labial mucosa compressed by upper incisors, suggestive ocular focus, one raised eyebrow, high-tension flirtatious expression
Glitch-Face / Digital Corruption: fragmented facial features, pixelated skin textures, offset ocular alignment, chromatic aberration on facial edges, cybernetic breakdown
Pareidolia (Stone Face): facial features emerging from rock textures, moss-covered skin, weathered geological grooves forming eyes and mouth, ancient mountain spirit
Fluid / Melting Expression: facial features drooping like liquid, distorted anatomy, dripping skin surface, surrealist Salvador Dali-inspired facial decay
Crying Mercury: metallic liquid tears flowing from eyes, chrome-textured skin, reflective facial surface, cold and surreal emotional output
Whispering Wind (Mist-Face): face formed by swirling fog and smoke, hollow ocular sockets, ethereal and disappearing features, atmospheric phantom aesthetic
Floral Overgrowth: flowers blooming from ocular sockets and mouth, vines integrated into skin, botanical facial fusion, beautiful and macabre nature-death
Inferno-Scream: face made of incandescent embers and flames, glowing volcanic skin cracks, eyes as white-hot light sources, elemental rage
